roleset.name: (attempt to) conceal, push down, concealing
roleset.note: SUPPRESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'suppress' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries concealment-16 and subjugate-42.3. (from suppress.01-v)

example.name: push down
example.text: Various cultural and economic forces have suppressed demand.

example.name: conceal
example.text: Had the suit been filed in time, they said, ``[Bare-Faced Messiah]-1'' would have been suppressed *trace*-1.

example.name: Arg 1 only will be most common

roleset.name: able to be pushed down, attenuated
roleset.note: SUPPRESSIBLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-2,3. Relation to 'suppress.01'. (from suppressible.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: The time of water wars is upon us with the privatization of water resources worldwide by multinational conglomerates who-1 [*-1] are not accountable to , or suppressible by the local populations they effect , even here in America .
example.arg: by the local populations they effect
